title: Wall Street falls amid caution on trade
text:
Wall Street falls amid caution on trade

Stock Markets 32 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 04:06PM ET)

© Reuters. FILE PHOTO: A trader works on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange shortly after the opening bell in New York NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks eased on Monday as reports on the U.S.-China trade front kept investors cautious ahead of scheduled talks later in the week. The Dow Jones Industrial Average ( ) fell 96.65 points, or 0.36%, to 26,477.07, the S&P 500 ( ) lost 13.38 points, or 0.45%, to 2,938.63 and the Nasdaq Composite ( ) dropped 26.18 points, or 0.33%, to 7,956.29.

Wall Street falls amid caution on trade
description: Wall Street falls amid caution on trade
